Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to transform into event log suitable for process mining. Provide table with columns: Case ID, Activity, Timestamp, maybe other attributes like Application, Document. Need to infer cases: logical units of work: editing a specific document, handling an email, reviewing PDF, updating budget. So we can define cases:

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: - Case 1: Document1.docx editing (writing intro, details, save, later reference insertion). So events from 09:00:00 focus Document1, typing, save, later switch back at 09:06:00, typing, save, close. So case ID maybe C1. - Case 2: Email reply about Annual Meeting. Events: switch to Chrome email, open email, scroll, click reply, typing, send, maybe close? So case ID C2. - Case 3: Review Report_Draft.pdf. Events: switch to Acrobat, scroll, highlight. So case ID C3. - Case 4: Budget_2024.xlsx update. Events: focus Excel, typing, save. So case ID C4. - Case 5: Quarterly_Report.docx executive summary. Events: focus, typing, save, close. So case ID C5. Potential also include initial focus on Quarterly_Report at 08:59:50 but no activity until later. Could be part of same case as C5.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Thus produce event log rows with Activity names standardized: e.g., Open Document, Edit Document, Save Document, Switch Application, Read Email, Reply Email, Send Email, Review PDF, Highlight Text, Update Spreadsheet, Insert Row, etc. But need each event correspond to meaningful activity. For each raw event we map to higher-level activity.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let's map: - FOCUS on a document: Open Document (or Focus Document). - TYPING in Word: Edit Document. - SAVE: Save Document. - SWITCH: Switch Application. Could be separate activity but maybe not needed for process analysis; we could treat as Switch to Application. But we can include as event with activity Switch Application. - CLICK open email: Open Email. - SCROLL: Read Email. - CLICK reply: Reply Email. - TYPING in email: Compose Reply. - CLICK send: Send Email. - SCROLL in PDF: Read PDF. - HIGHLIGHT: Highlight Text. - TYPING in Excel: Edit Spreadsheet. - SAVE in Excel: Save Spreadsheet. - CLOSE: Close Document.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let's construct event log in chronological order, each row with case ID. We need to include timestamps as given. Let's assign case IDs: C1: Document1.docx editing. C2: Email handling. C3: Report_Draft.pdf review. C4: Budget_2024.xlsx update. C5: Quarterly_Report.docx. Potential also include initial focus on Quarterly_Report at 08:59:50 as part of C5 (preparation). So include that.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let's list events: 1. 2024-12-11T08:59:50.000Z, FOCUS, Microsoft Word, Quarterly_Report.docx -> case C5, activity Open Document. 2. 2024-12-11T09:00:00.000Z, FOCUS, Microsoft Word, Document1.docx -> case C1, activity Open Document. 3. 2024-12-11T09:00:30.000Z, TYPING, Microsoft Word, Document1.docx -> C1, Edit Document. 4. 2024-12-11T09:01:00.000Z, TYPING, Microsoft Word, Document1.docx -> C1, Edit Document. 5. 2024-12-11T09:01:15.000Z, SAVE, Microsoft Word, Document1.docx -> C1, Save Document. 6. 2024-12-11T09:01:45.000Z, SWITCH, From Word Document1 to Chrome Email Inbox -> maybe separate activity Switch Application. Could assign to case C2? Actually switch is part of moving to email case. So case C2, activity Switch to Email. 7. 2024-12-11T09:02:00.000Z, CLICK Open Email about Annual Meeting -> C2, Open Email. 8. 2024-12-11T09:02:30.000Z, SCROLL, Chrome Email Inbox -> C2, Read Email. 9. 2024-12-11T09:02:45.000Z, CLICK Reply -> C2, Reply Email. 10. 2024-12-11T09:03:00.000Z, TYPING, Chrome Email, Keys=Meeting details confirmed -> C2, Compose Reply. 11. 2024-12-11T09:03:20.000Z, CLICK Send Email -> C2, Send Email. 12. 2024-12-11T09:04:00.000Z, SWITCH to Adobe Acrobat Report_Draft.pdf -> case C3, activity Switch to PDF. 13. 2024-12-11T09:04:30.000Z, SCROLL PDF -> C3, Read PDF. 14. 2024-12-11T09:04:45.000Z, HIGHLIGHT PDF -> C3, Highlight Text. 15. 2024-12-11T09:05:00.000Z, FOCUS Excel Budget_2024.xlsx -> C4, Open Spreadsheet. 16. 2024-12-11T09:05:15.000Z, TYPING Excel, Update Q1 figures -> C4, Edit Spreadsheet. 17. 2024-12-11T09:05:30.000Z, TYPING Excel, Insert new row for Q2 -> C4, Edit Spreadsheet. 18. 2024-12-11T09:05:45.000Z, SAVE Excel -> C4, Save Spreadsheet. 19. 2024-12-11T09:06:00.000Z, SWITCH back to Word Document1.docx -> case C1, activity Switch to Document1. 20. 2024-12-11T09:06:15.000Z, TYPING Word Document1, Inserting reference to budget -> C1, Edit Document. 21. 2024-12-11T09:06:30.000Z, SAVE Word Document1 -> C1, Save Document. 22. 2024-12-11T09:07:00.000Z, CLOSE Document1 -> C1, Close Document. 23. 2024-12-11T09:07:15.000Z, FOCUS Quarterly_Report.docx -> C5, Open Document (or Focus Document). 24. 2024-12-11T09:07:45.000Z, TYPING Quarterly_Report, Executive Summary draft -> C5, Edit Document. 25. 2024-12-11T09:08:00.000Z, SAVE Quarterly_Report -> C5, Save Document. 26. 2024-12-11T09:08:15.000Z, CLOSE,App=Microsoft Word,Window=Quarterly_Report.docx -> C5, Close Document.
